summary.span: 为 类和 类提供一个共同的成员实现方法。

span.span: Provides a common implementation of members for the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类为 和 控件提供公共元素的实现。The class provides implementations of common elements for the and controls. 以下属性是数据绑定 或 的用户的主要问题： 、、和 属性。The following properties are of primary concern to users of a data-bound or : , , , and properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个完整的应用程序，它演示了如何使用 类实现的 类 、、和 成员。The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use , , , and members of the class as implemented by the class. 该示例将加载 和列表框。The example loads an and the list box. 当用户在列表框中选择某个项时，所选的值将用于返回与所选项相关联的数据。When the user selects an item in the list box, the selected value is used to return the data associated with the selected item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过两种方式填充 和 控件。There are two ways to fill the and controls. 例如，你可以通过使用 方法将对象添加到 。For example, you can add objects to the by using the method. 还可以通过使用 、和 属性将对象添加到 ，以填充 。You can also add objects to a by using the , , and properties to fill the . 设置 属性后，用户将无法修改项集合。When the property is set, a user cannot modify the items collection. 如果设置 属性会导致数据源发生更改，则会引发 事件。If setting the property causes the data source to change, the event is raised. 如果设置此属性会导致数据成员发生更改，则会引发 事件。If setting this property causes the data member to change, the event is raised. 将 设置为 `null`时， 设置为空字符串（""）。When you set to `null`, is set to an empty string (""). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个完整的应用程序，它演示了如何使用 类实现的 类 、、和 成员。The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use , , , and members of the class as implemented by the class. 该示例将加载 和列表框。The example loads an and the list box. 当用户在列表框中选择某个项时，所选的值将用于返回与所选项相关联的数据。When the user selects an item in the list box, the selected value is used to return the data associated with the selected item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到一个项目中，该项目包含继承自 的类型的实例，如 或 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后，将该实例命名为 `ListControl1` 并确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then name the instance `ListControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承自 的控件可以显示不同类型的对象。The controls that inherit from can display diverse types of objects. 如果对象上不存在指定的属性，或 的值为空字符串（""），则改为显示该对象的 `ToString` 方法的结果。If the specified property does not exist on the object or the value of is an empty string (""), the results of the object's `ToString` method are displayed instead. 如果无法设置新的显示成员，则会保留上一个显示成员设置。If the new display member cannot be set, the previous display member setting is maintained. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个完整的应用程序，它演示了如何使用 类实现的 类 、、和 成员。The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use , , , and members of the class as implemented by the class. 该示例将加载 和列表框。The example loads an and the list box. 当用户在列表框中选择某个项时，所选的值将用于返回与所选项相关联的数据。When the user selects an item in the list box, the selected value is used to return the data associated with the selected item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件在 中的每个可见项设置格式之前引发。The event is raised before each visible item in the is formatted. 通过处理此事件，您可以通过 的 属性访问为此列表项显示的字符串。Handling this event gives you access to the string to be displayed for this list item, through the property of the . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到一个项目中，该项目包含继承自 的类型的实例，如 或 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后，将该实例命名为 `ListControl1` 并确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then name the instance `ListControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性设置为 "`true` 会导致为 的每个可见成员引发 事件。Setting the property to `true` causes the event to be raised for each visible member of the . 、和 都是相关的，如下所示：, , and are related as follows: - 如果 `false`，则当 为空时， 将不会设置为-1。If is `false`, will not be set to -1 when is blank. - 如果 `true`，则当 为空时， 将设置为-1。If is `true`, will be set to -1 when is blank.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置由 属性指定的成员属性的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the member property specified by the property.

value.span: 包含由 属性指定的数据源成员的值的对象。

span.span: An object containing the value of the member of the data source specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 中未指定属性，则 返回对象的 `ToString` 方法的结果。If a property is not specified in , returns the results of the `ToString` method of the object. 、和 都是相关的，如下所示：, , and are related as follows: - 如果 `false`，则当 为空时， 将不会设置为-1。If is `false`, will not be set to -1 when is blank. - 如果 `true`，则当 为空时， 将设置为-1。If is `true`, will be set to -1 when is blank. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 返回 属性指定的属性的值。The following code example shows the returning the value of the property specified by the property. 此代码摘自 类概述中所示的示例。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 有关完整代码列表，请参阅 。See for the whole code listing. [!code-cpp[ListControl#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ListControl#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ListControl#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个完整的应用程序，它演示了如何使用 类实现的 类 、、和 成员。The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use , , , and members of the class as implemented by the class. 该示例将加载 和列表框。The example loads an and the list box. 当用户选择列表框中的项时，此示例还使用 事件来填充文本框。The example also uses the event to fill in a text box when the user selects an item in the list box. 文本框中将填充与所选项相关联的数据。The text box is filled with the data associated with the selected item. summary.span: 获取或设置属性的路径，它将用作 中的项的实际值。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the property to use as the actual value for the items in the .

value.span: ，表示 属性值的单个属性名称，或解析为最终数据绑定对象的属性名、单个属性名或句点分隔的属性名层次结构。

span.span: A representing a single property name of the property value, or a hierarchy of period-delimited property names that resolves to a property name of the final data-bound object.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在绑定数据的情况下，指定 属性的内容。Specify the contents of the property in cases where you bind data. 可以通过将属性设置为空字符串（""）或 `null`来清除 属性。You can clear the property by setting the property to an empty string ("") or `null`. 设置新 属性会引发 并 事件。Setting a new property raises the and events. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将数据加载到 ，并将 设置为列表中的对象的属性。The following code example shows loading the data into an and setting the to a property of the object in the list. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到一个项目中，该项目包含继承自 的类型的实例，如 或 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后，将该实例命名为 `ListControl1` 并确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then name the instance `ListControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#148](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#148)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#148](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#148)]
